briefdescription.para: Mesh API provides a developer a simple way to incorporate LE mesh functionality in an AIROC application.

detaileddescription.para: Most application will only need access to Mesh Models library. The applications that supports adding new devices to the mesh network (provisioning) and network configuration may also use Mesh Provisioning library. Applications that use Vendor specific models in addition to standard Bluetooth SIG models, may also need to access Mesh Core library functions directly.
